items.sentence: I want you to know I won't be there tomorrow afternoon.
I think Tom was glad that he wasn't allowed to do that.
Could you ride a bicycle when you were three years old?
I hope we don't have to spend the whole day doing this.
We haven't gotten to spend much time together recently.
Is it OK if I spend the night over at a friend's house?
Tom spent three years working as a farmer in Australia.
You should've spent more time proofreading your report.
Tom spent a lot of time trying to learn how to do that.
I ran as fast as possible, but I missed the last train.
